name: English to Norwegian
content: You have contacted the English language chat support. Do you want me to transfer you to one of our colleagues on the Norwegian chat support?

name: IT to HR
content:
You have now contacted the general chat, and this inquiry falls under our HR-department.
You must therefore open a new chat and choose: 'HR Live Chat' on this page: https://equinor.service-now.com/selfservice?id=connect_live_chat 
Sorry for the inconvenience, have a nice day!

name: IT to SubSurface
content: This inquiry falls under our SubSurface/UNIX-department. Please wait while I find an available agent to connect you with.

name: IT to Finance/Procurement
content: This inquiry falls under our Finance/Procurement-department. Please wait while I find an available agent to connect you with.

name: IT to Facility
content: This inquiry falls under our Facility-department. Unfortunately they are not available on chat. I can create a ticket and convey your inquiry to them.

name: IT to Meeting room
content: This inquiry falls under our Meetingroom-department. Unfortunately they are not available on chat. I can create a ticket and convey your inquiry to them. If this is of urgency, your you wish to be assisted immediately, please call us on: +47 51 999 222 and press the extention '0' for meetingroom support

name: IT to o365
content:
We have a dedicated team that handles more complex office-related inquiries. Please hold this chat open for a moment while I transfer you.
Thank you for chatting with us today. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us at your leisure. 
Have a great day!

name: IT to SYNERGI
content:
We have a dedicated team that handles synergi-related inquiries. Please hold this chat open for a moment while I transfer you.
Thank you for chatting with us today. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us at your leisure. 
Have a great day!
